Posts.Content: Mar 19, 2016 12:22AM Joy73 wrote: I had my oophorectomy 10 days ago and I feel great! After having had 3 c-sections I think I feared the recovery would be like a c-section. I'm so glad I had the surgery! Glad you are recovering well! Kristi
Posts.Title: Had my oophorectomy yesterday. phrogger78 RonnieKay
